thread.section_title: Space City Drones Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Space City Drones | spacecitydrones.com
thread.title: Andrew Nicholas
thread.title_full: Space City Drones reviewed by Andrew Nicholas

author: Andrew Nicholas
title: Andrew Nicholas
text:
Space City Drones was great to deal with! They were honest and responsive to all of my questions! I highly recommend!
I recently purchased a Mavic Pro from DJI. Although DJI had supply chain issues and were not able to ship immediately, Space City Drones kept me informed and even offered to refund my money if I just could not wait any longer.
